local_intent: Detect bread, set yaw to 90, approach and align to bread within tolerance, then verify position at bread.
assumptions: Yaw=90 is appropriate for pinch approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: DetectObject -> SetTCPYaw(90) -> ApproachAndAlign(bread, 0.005, 1200) -> verify with IsAt, matching the GLOBAL_BT ordering and intent before grasp computation.
